thread.title: Tickets on sale for Les Misérables at Brockport High
thread.title_full: Tickets on sale for Les Misérables at Brockport High

author: Caurie Putnam - Brockport, ROC
title: Tickets on sale for Les Misérables at Brockport High
text:
by Caurie Putnam Tickets are on sale now for the Brockport High School Drama Club's production of Les Misérables.
The show will be held November 12 to 14 at 7 p.m. and November 15 at 2 p.m. in the Brockport High School Auditorium.
Tickets are $12 and can be purchased by visiting www.showtix4u.com or going to the Brockport High School greeter’s desk during school hours.
Tickets at the door will be $15.
Epic, grand and uplifting, Les Misérables is considered by many to be one the greatest musicals ever written.
In 19th century France, Jean Valjean is released from years of unjust imprisonment, but finds nothing in store for him except mistrust and mistreatment. He breaks his parole in hopes of starting a new life, initiating a life-long struggle for redemption. Valjean is then relentlessly pursued by police inspector Javert, who refuses to believe he can change his ways. Finally, during the Paris student uprising of 1832, Javert must confront his ideals after Valjean spares his life and saves that of the student revolutionary who has captured the heart of Valjean's adopted daughter.
